synopsis.text: His telepathic abilities thrust Kyosuke Kasuga into an unexpected journey when a car accident propels him three years into the future. Now 19, Kyosuke finds himself in a race against time to locate his 22-year-old future self, who is a photographer believed to be lost in Bosnia. To restore his original timeline, Kyosuke must navigate through complex emotions and reunions with old acquaintances, including Hikaru, a famous dancer whose feelings for him remain unchanged. Meanwhile, Madoka grapples with the disappearance of the 22-year-old Kyosuke and the car accident involving the 19-year-old. Will Kyosuke succeed in restoring his timeline while balancing his relationships, or will the challenges prove insurmountable? Only time will reveal the outcome of this extraordinary tale of love and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
